about_the_game:
The quiet town of Frozen Pines. It was the perfect place to get away, just the two of you. So then why? Why did things go so horribly wrong?

You wake up at the edge of town to find your love missing. A strange signal calls to you, urging you to save her. She's been taken by a presence deep within the lake. The same presence responsible for twisting the town and its inhabitants into the warped nightmare you find yourself in now. Follow the signal through town, searching the desolate buildings for survivors.

Beware, you're being hunted. Strange and deadly monstrosities hide behind every corner. Armed with only an axe and your wits, find a way to survive and save the one you love.

But why... why can't you remember their name?

Only by facing the horrors can you find the answers you seek.

FEATURES

  • Brutal grid-based combat with directional attacking and blocking that requires both quick reflexes and strategic thinking.

  • Free-roam system allows seamless swapping between grid-based movement, and traditional first person controls for smooth exploration.

  • Choose your route through the town of Frozen Pines, changing the order of characters, bosses, and upgrades you'll encounter.

  • Solve the mystery of the warping that has twisted the town and those within it, only by facing the horrors can you find the answers you seek.

  • Explore a variety of eerie locations as you search for survivors and the one you love, discovering more about the town and yourself.

_____________________________________________________________________

content_descriptors.notes: Scenes of stylized violence and gore. Horror. And occasional profanity.

name: Kill The Dream

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 / Radeon HD 7850 / HD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Kill The Dream is a survival horror game that combines brutal grid-based combat with chilling first person exploration. Search the town of Frozen Pines, where survivors and reality itself have been warped by a twisted presence. Hack your way through, end the nightmare, kill the dream.
